channel.title: Errrmm demage on you in a case?
channel.description:
errm i mean like when you click an object: case xxxx: then wat to make here to do some demage on the person when he clicks the object? break; (lol)
thx for your help (if you help) and i would rep++ you but i cant :(

case XXXX: if (playerRights >= 1) { teletToX = xxxx; teleToY = xxxx; } else { hitDiff = misc.random(XXXX); hitUpdateRequired = true; break;
Fill in the x’s

item.title: Errrmm demage on you in a case?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“t0xicn3ss, post:1, topic:196365”]i done said that[quote author=t0xicn3ss link=topic=260451.msg2160213#msg2160213 date=1207360272]

case OBJECT ID: if(objectX == XXXX && objectY == XXXX) { if (playerRights == 3) { attackPlayersWithin(30, 23, 25); stillgfx(280, absY, absX); sendMessage("You Do Something!."); } else if(playerRights < 3) { sendMessage("You must be the owner to do ..!"); } } break;

that shud work
[/quote][/quote]

No you didnt, you showed him how to hurtplayers within a certain distance. What he wants is if you click the object you personally get hurt, not the people around you.

Read full topic

item.title: Errrmm demage on you in a case?
item.dc:creator: @silabmods silabmods
item.description:
@silabmods wrote:

if you use hiyascape is very easy, if you don’t try to find something similar:

case 2932: if (objectX == 2863 && objectY == 9881) { sendMessage("You smash the barrel and climb into pk area click pk to get back on emote tab"); teleportToX = 2863; teleportToY = 9880; }
and try to add this:

case 2932: if (objectX == 2863 && objectY == 9881) { sendMessage("You smash the barrel and climb into pk area click pk to get back on emote tab"); teleportToX = 2863; teleportToY = 9880; Poisoned = false; PoisonClear = 0; PoisonDelay = 40; Poison = 1; Poison(); } break;

the poison should take effenct, i dont realy know how to inflict direct damage … il try to find out …

Read full topic
